parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets marker type locally. Marker type is a class name in [[CfgMarkers]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> markerName [[setMarkerTypeLocal]] type

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - See [[CfgMarkers]].

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" [[setMarkerTypeLocal]] "Warning";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[CfgMarkers]] [[setMarkerAlpha]] [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]] [[setMarkerBrush]] [[setMarkerBrushLocal]] [[setMarkerColor]] [[setMarkerColorLocal]] [[setMarkerDir]] [[setMarkerDirLocal]] [[setMarkerPos]] [[setMarkerPosLocal]] [[setMarkerShape]] [[setMarkerShapeLocal]] [[setMarkerSize]] [[setMarkerSizeLocal]] [[setMarkerText]] [[setMarkerTextLocal]] [[setMarkerType]] [[markerType]]
</value></part></template>
